title: GOAP Goal Definition
description: Defines a single, reusable world-state target for a GOAP agent. It specifies the goal's priority, the conditions under which it is relevant, and the desired state of the world to be achieved.
$comment: Goals are evaluated highest 'priority' first. The 'relevance' condition must pass against the live world state for the goal to be considered by the planner.

id.description: The unique, namespaced ID for this goal definition (e.g., 'core:goal_survive', 'monsters:goal_attack_intruder').

description.description: Optional. A human-readable explanation of what this goal represents, for documentation and debugging.

priority.description: Required. A numeric value indicating the goal's importance. The GoapBrain will select the relevant goal with the highest priority.

relevance.description: Required. A JSON-Logic condition that must be true in the current world state for this goal to be considered active or relevant.

goalState.description: Required. A JSON-Logic condition describing the desired world state. The GoapPlannerService will build a plan to make this condition true.
